featured.text: The country has been troubled by a problem with trains colliding with deer on its railways.
They mate at night near railways.
This new device has been invented by a team at the country’s Railway Technical Research Institute (RTRI).
A railway manager, Knight specialized in designing the signaling system for Britain’s growing railway network in the 1860s.
Thus, he proposed a signaling system based on the railway movable-arm signal:

other.text: What device has NOT been used to solve the railway problem in Japan? (A) Flashing lights.
Deer are attracted to railway lines because of a need for iron in their diets.
RTRI researchers say late-night tests, at times when deer are most frequently seen by railway tracks, have resulted in a 45 percent reduction of deer sighting.

definition.zh_def: 鐵路系統，用於火車運輸的軌道和相關設施。
definition.en_def: A system of tracks along which trains run, including the infrastructure and facilities associated with train transport.
definition.example: The railway connects several major cities across the country.
